document.full_text: the man who created the first version of the uber-successful "madden nfl football" video game is suing electronic arts over tens of millions of dollars in owed royalties and potentially billions in profits over the franchise, which has sold more than 85 million copies in the more than 20 years since it hit the marketplace.
document.title: video game creator sues company for billions
lines_and_colors: the man who created the first version of the uber-successful "madden nfl football" video game is suing electronic arts over tens of millions of dollars in owed royalties and potentially billions in profits over the franchise, which has sold more than 85 million copies in the more than 20 years since it hit the marketplace.
